scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Included is genealogical data on the descendants of Captain Hercules Courtenay, the family of Edward Henry (November 19, 1803-December 21, 1853) and Harriet Whitehorne (Rathbone) Courtenay (July 1, 1802- November 11, 1844), and the family of Benjamin and Mary (Malbone) Rathbone. Other material includes: biographical information on Edward Henry Courtenay (1803-1853); an obituary of Edward Henry Courtenay (April 11, 1842-June 3, 1902); documents re: the marriage of Edward Henry Courtenay and Margaret B. Barnes on October 22, 1922; papers re: the estate of David Stewart Courtenay, Jr. (May 24, 1850-1874); and a manuscript entitled "History of the House of Courtenay."
